Name: When my wrongs are worse than yours: behavioral and neural asymmetries in first-person and third-person perspectives of accidents
Funding: This work was supported by the John Templeton Foundation and the National Science Foundation
Acknowledgments: The authors thank Minjae Kim, Ryan McManus, BoKyung Park, Justin Martin, Gordon Kraft-Todd, Kevin Jiang, and other members of the Boston College Morality Lab for their helpful feedback.
